main event: On April 22, 1966, five civilian witnesses in Akron, Ohio observed a bright red, spherical object for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was viewed through heavy clouds, fog, mist, and light rain.
One observer stated the object looked like a commercial airliner, and it was likely circling the nearby Akron-Canton Airport to make a landing.
The object was described as a very bright red glow and spherical in shape.
The witnesses lived near the Akron-Canton Airport, so the object was likely an aircraft.
A lady living 30 miles away also reported seeing a UFO around the same time, describing it as coming in at a downward angle from the north at high speed, then passing out of sight to the southeast.
